programme.title: Lielceļš cauri ellei 10
programme.desc: Smago auto glābšanas komanda dara to, ko diez vai visā pasaulē spēj vēl kāds – dodas uz visbīstamākajiem kalnu ceļiem, kur notikusi kāda nelaime ar kravas auto. Šādi negadījumi nosprosto ceļus un veidojas milzīgi sastrēgumi, kuros iesprūst miljoniem vērtas kravu un rada zaudējumus to īpašniekiem. Tāpēc darbs ir svarīgs, atbildīgs un veicams pēc iespējas ātrāk. Komandas vadītājs ir Džeimijs Deiviss, kurš šo biznesu vada jau otrajā paaudzē. Darba ir daudz, un par to ne vienmēr ir prieks – ir gana daudz iespēju kaut kam aiziet greizi. Turklāt darbs bieži vien notiek sliktos laika apstākļos – sniegā, vētrā un naktī.

programme.title: Pasaules smieklīgāko video kuriozu top 10 3
programme.desc: Ik dienu pasaulē notiek negaidīti, pārsteidzoši, neveikli un smieklīgi gadījumi – īsti kuriozi. Labi, ja tādos brīžos pa rokai gadījusies videokamera, un šie jautrie gadījumi ir iemūžināti. Raidījums apkopojis smieklīgākos video kuriozus no visas pasaules.

programme.title: Pretī nezināmajam
programme.desc: Pieredzējušais piedzīvojumu meklētājs un pētnieks Klifs Saimons meklē patiesības graudu mūsdienu spoku stāstos. Pētot paranormālus noslēpumus dažās no ekstrēmākajām un izaicinošākajām vietām uz mūsu planētas, Klifs cer atklāt, kas patiesībā slēpjas aiz leģendām apvītiem nostāstiem. Havaju salu nakts rēgi, Brūnā kalna gaismas, rugarū, lielā pēda, pazušanas Šasta kalnā Kalifornijā – šie neizskaidrojamie noslēpumi biedē vietējos iedzīvotājus gadu desmitiem. Lai nokļūtu leģendām apvītajās vietās, kur lielākā daļa cilvēku nu bīstas spert kāju, Klifam nāksies šķērsot bīstamus apvidus, peldēt un pat rāpot. Bet zinātnieki, šamaņi, vēsturnieki un aculiecinieki atklās norādes, kas ļaus izprast šos tumšos noslēpumus. Vai Klifam izdosies atklāt, kur mītiem „aug kājas”?

programme.title: Mini pa trim 4
programme.desc: Attapības spēle ģimenei un draugiem, kuru vada iemīļotais mūziķis, viens no šova “X Faktors” žūrijas locekļiem – Intars Busulis, kurš skatītājiem un spēles viesiem uzburs mājas ballītes sajūtu. Arī šajā sezonā savā starpā sacentīsies trīs komandas. Katrā komandā būs sabiedrībā atpazīstamas un mīlētas personības, kuras sacentīsies kopā ar sev tuviem cilvēkiem – draugiem, kolēģiem un ģimenes locekļiem. Taču šajā sezonā spēļu jautājumi nebūs vērsti uz vispārējo erudīciju un padziļinātām zināšanām par kādu jomu, bet gan uz atraktivitāti, attapību un loģisko domāšanu. Intars Busulis kopā ar spēles dalībniekiem kopā uzburs mājas ballītes sajūtu, tāpēc šogad spēles dalībniekus sagaida deviņas atraktīvas spēles, kurās būs jāiesaistās visiem spēles dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Simpsoni 17
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta, vārdā Springfīlda. Šai gluži parastajā pilsētā dzīvo gluži parasta ģimene Simpsoni: papus Homērs, dumiķis, kas strādā kodolreaktorā; visnotaļ prātīgā mamma Mārdža, mājsaimniece; izcili gudrā un talantīgā mazā Liza; viņas brālis dauzoņa Bārts un mazā Megija. Lai gan ģimene šķiet visnotaļ ikdienišķa, viņu dzīve ir neparastiem notikumiem bagāta un skar mūs visus interesējošas tēmas – no attiecībām ģimenē līdz pat pilsētas un visas cilvēces nākotnei... „Simsoni” ir kulta seriāls jau no tā radīšanas brīža, pateicoties veselīgajam, asajam humoram un veidotāju izdomai. Seriāls savā pagaidām 21 sezonā laidis klajā vairāk nekā 440 sēriju un nopelnījis vairāk nekā 20 slaveno „Emmy” balvu. Un kā saka „Simpsonu” tēvs Mets Gronings (Matt Groening): „Beigas vēl nav redzamas.”

programme.title: Krietnie zagļi: Izpirkšana
programme.desc: “Krietno zagļu” komanda atkal apvienojas, lai atzīmētu Neita nāves gadadienu. Lai gan Sofija kopš tā laika taisnības cīņai ir metusi mieru, kolēģi vēlas pārliecināt viņu uzņemties jaunu darbu. Soli pa solim, un Sofija ar jauno komandu atkal ir gatava darīt to, kas viņai padodas vislabāk: palīdzēt tiem, kuri nevēlas vai nespēj atrisināt savas problēmas ar likumīgām metodēm un policijas palīdzību. Tas nozīmē, ka viņiem ir jāapkrāpj blēži, kas iedzīvojušies uz sveša īpašuma rēķina un bieži vien pat skaitās sabiedrībā cienījami ļaudis.

programme.title: Antikvariāts uz riteņiem 3
programme.desc: Antīko lietu pārzinātāja Kristīna Trevanjona un amatnieks Vils Kērks apceļo Lielbritānijas mājsaimniecības, noslauka putekļus no tur atrastām, nenovērtētām pērlēm un atklāj to stāstus. Šie dārgumu mednieki ķeras pie relikviju rūpīgas atjaunošanas un, kad lietas atguvušas agrāko spozmi, ļauj tām nonākt pareizajās rokās, dodot jaunu dzīvi.

programme.title: Sacīkstes izdzīvotājiem. Aļaska
programme.desc: Kurš gan uzdrīkstētos šķērsot mežonīgo, bīstamo Aļasku pa cilvēku neiemītām takām, ņemot līdzi tikai to, ko var panest? Ja mērķis ir iespaidīga 500 tūkstošus liela naudas balva, atrodas drosmīgie, kuri ir gatavi riskēt! Sacensību dalībnieki liks lietā orientēšanās un izdzīvošanas prasmes, lai mērotu ceļu pāri cilvēku neskartai, mežonīgai teritorijai. Katrā sacensību posmā komanda, kas finišu sasniegs pēdējā, tiks izslēgta. Kā veidosies alianses, kas motivēs dalībniekus un uz ko pāri būs gatavi, lai iegūtu vietu finālā?

programme.title: Sacīkstes izdzīvotājiem. Aļaska
programme.desc: Kurš gan uzdrīkstētos šķērsot mežonīgo, bīstamo Aļasku pa cilvēku neiemītām takām, ņemot līdzi tikai to, ko var panest? programme.title: Apvāršņi
programme.desc: Vīruss pārvērš zemei draudzīgos citplanētiešus par cilvēku ļaunāko ienaidnieku, un drīz cilvēce ir ierauta nevienlīdzīgā cīņā. Kapteinei Rouzai Korlijai piemīt citplanētiešu superspējas, tādēļ viņa vienīgā spēj stāties tiem pretī. Rouza izveido elitāru algotņu komandu un kopā ar to dodas uz citplanētiešu planētu, lai glābtu to, kas no cilvēces vēl palicis pāri.

programme.title: Eiss Ventura: dabas aicinājums
programme.desc: Šoreiz kopā ar Eisu Venturu tevi gaida Āfrika! Pasaulē vienīgais zvēru detektīvs jau atkal ir ķēries pie lietas! Tagad viņam jāatrod svētais sikspārnis, bez kura nu nekādi nevar notikt kāzas starp divu karojošu cilšu vadoņu atvasēm. Lai Eiss Ventura atrastu dzīvnieku, kā rezultātā Vačutū un Vačatī ciltīs beidzot varētu noslēgt mieru, laika ir pavisam maz, bet tu jau zini, ka Eiss Ventura nekad nepadodas! Viņš dosies cīniņā ar krokodiliem, pieradinās ziloņus, lidināsies liānās, staigās pa kvēlojošām oglēm, vārdu sakot, sacels kājās visu kontinentu!

programme.title: Lielceļš cauri ellei 10
programme.desc: Smago auto glābšanas komanda dara to, ko diez vai visā pasaulē spēj vēl kāds – dodas uz visbīstamākajiem kalnu ceļiem, kur notikusi kāda nelaime ar kravas auto. Šādi negadījumi nosprosto ceļus un veidojas milzīgi sastrēgumi, kuros iesprūst miljoniem vērtas kravu un rada zaudējumus to īpašniekiem. Tāpēc darbs ir svarīgs, atbildīgs un veicams pēc iespējas ātrāk. Komandas vadītājs ir Džeimijs Deiviss, kurš šo biznesu vada jau otrajā paaudzē. Darba ir daudz, un par to ne vienmēr ir prieks – ir gana daudz iespēju kaut kam aiziet greizi. Turklāt darbs bieži vien notiek sliktos laika apstākļos – sniegā, vētrā un naktī.

programme.title: Āzijas ekspedīcija
programme.desc: Ginesa rekorda īpašnieks ģeogrāfs Raiens Pails dodas aizraujošā ekspedīcijā uz Āziju! Filipīnas, Ķīna, Indonēzija, Malaizija, Mongolija, Taivāna, Kirgizstāna, Taizeme, Indija, Honkonga – visas šīs zemes ir pārbagātas dabas brīnumiem, iespaidīgām metropolēm, kultūras vērtībām. Desmit mēnešus piedzīvojumu mednieks Raeins un viņa komanda pavadīja apceļojot plašo kontinentu un piedzīvojot gan iezemiešu kultūras dažādību, gan neparedzamās dabas stihijas. Pievienojies ģeogrāfu saimei – aizceļo uz kontinenta Austrumu daļu!

programme.title: Pasaules smieklīgāko video kuriozu top 10 3
programme.desc: Ik dienu pasaulē notiek negaidīti, pārsteidzoši, neveikli un smieklīgi gadījumi – īsti kuriozi. Labi, ja tādos brīžos pa rokai gadījusies videokamera, un šie jautrie gadījumi ir iemūžināti. Raidījums apkopojis smieklīgākos video kuriozus no visas pasaules.

programme.title: Nemīlētie
programme.desc: 64. sērijaLorenss joprojām mēģina atrisināt Keitas problēmas ar viņas piedzīvotāju Ričardu, draugam piekrīt palīdzēt arī Zīle, kurš pēc dusmu izvirduma ir nomierinājies. Kamēr Ieva kārtējo nakti pavada izklaidēs, viņas meitu Mildu pieskata Zane. Zane piedzīvo pārsteigumu – ierodoties, kā viņa domā, Normunda dzīvoklī, Zane tur atrod simpātisku un puskailu meiteni, kura šajā dzīvoklī jūtas kā savās mājās. Zinot Zanes smago raksturu, Normundu tagad sagaida grūtibrīži. Artūrs no zonas atkal zvana savai mīļotajai sievai, bet Normunds no Oskara mēģina saprast, kāpēc Zane uz viņu tik ļoti sadusmojusies. Neredzot citu iespēju, Zīle visu izstāsta Zanei – gan par dzīvokli, gan tur esošo meiteni. Vai Zane noticēs šai Normunda drauga versijai? Bet Māris, bārā, kurā par bārmeni strādā Gabriēla, ierauga Keitas pāridarītāju Ričardu, un uzreiz zvana Zīlem un Lorensam!

programme.title: Queens of Ancient Egypt
programme.sub-title: The Egyptian queen Tiye inspired a religious revolution over 3,000 years ago that threw Egypt into turmoil - and may have blazed a trail for the worlds leading religions.
programme.desc: The famous Cleopatra is only one in a long line of Egyptian queens spanning 3,000 years of history; we explore the lives of three of ancient Egypts fascinating and charismatic female monarchs.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: France faced a tumultuous journey during and after WWII; this episode captures Frances struggle, resilience and rebirth and shows how architecture became a powerful symbol of recovery and renewal.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The war in Europe was over, but heavy fighting continued in the East and President Truman was desperate to bring the war to a close in the Pacific.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The emergence of the Cold War wasnt due to one single event; it was born from a series of steps laid by the United States and the Soviet Union, the two main powers of the alliance of WWII.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: Cleopatras Secret Tomb
programme.sub-title: Cleopatra did not hesitate to eliminate her enemies... even if they were family members; archaeologists enter the only Ptolemaic mausoleum ever discovered to shed light on the queens family.
programme.desc: Archaeologists may finally be close to finding Cleopatras final resting place thanks to new discoveries; join us and unravel the mysteries of this legendary queen.

programme.title: Cleopatras Secret Tomb
programme.sub-title: After delving in the Battle of Actium, this final episode takes us to Alexandria, where Cleopatra and her lover ended their lives; will this investigation finally lead to the legendary queens tomb?
programme.desc: Archaeologists may finally be close to finding Cleopatras final resting place thanks to new discoveries; join us and unravel the mysteries of this legendary queen.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: A team of experts investigate the methods Hitler used to indoctrinate Germany, turning it into a finely-tuned war machine; we visit Goebbels Propaganda Ministry and the holiday park of Prora.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.sub-title: The war in Europe is transformed when, on 22nd June 1941, Hitler unleashes Operation Barbarossa. The Nazi invasion of The Soviet Union has begun.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.sub-title: Japanese troops occupy Southern Vietnam and Cambodia, but the day that changes the war comes on December 7th when Japanese aircraft attack the American Pacific Fleet at anchor in Pearl Harbor.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: A new excavation at Pompeii continues to unearth rich discoveries while a pioneering new investigation finds evidence that some Pompeiians survived the eruption of A.D. / C.E. 79.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: Emperor: The Rise and Fall of a Dynasty
programme.sub-title: Livia, the first empress of Rome, came to regret the scheming that put her son Tiberius on the throne as he and his heir Caligula dragged the empire into an age of tyranny and shocking depravity.
programme.desc: Delve into the most tumultuous era in Roman history with the stories of the first five emperors - and the powerful women behind them - told through the eyes of Livia, the matriarch of the Caesar clan.

programme.title: Roman Megastructures
programme.sub-title: During the Gallic Wars, Arles in the south of France fared really well. The most beautiful Roman monuments were built there, hence Arles was nicknamed the little Rome of Ancient Gaul.
programme.desc: We explore three cities that were once part of Julius Caesars quest to grow the Roman Empire; through the use of CGI and expert testimony, we unveil the secrets of these wonders of Roman engineering.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: France faced a tumultuous journey during and after WWII; this episode captures Frances struggle, resilience and rebirth and shows how architecture became a powerful symbol of recovery and renewal.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The war in Europe was over, but heavy fighting continued in the East and President Truman was desperate to bring the war to a close in the Pacific.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The emergence of the Cold War wasnt due to one single event; it was born from a series of steps laid by the United States and the Soviet Union, the two main powers of the alliance of WWII.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: Unearthed: The Mystery of the Shaman Woman
programme.desc: The grave of Bad Durrenberg revealed not a male warrior, but a powerful and dark-skinned female shaman; misrepresented by the Nazis, her true story still fascinates 9,000 years on.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped
programme.sub-title: The pockmarked mummy of Pharaoh Ramesses V looks serene, but theres evidence of deliberately inflicted wounds that suggest a sudden violent death... if this was the case, then who was the killer?
programme.desc: Come on a journey to some of the greatest mysteries of the ancient Egyptian world to discover the remarkable secrets behind unmarked sarcophagi, unusual burials, horribly disfigured mummies and more.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped
programme.sub-title: The mangled mummy of Pharaoh Seqenenre Taa is a murder mystery that endures to this day; we discover the truth behind his brutal and humiliating death.
programme.desc: Come on a journey to some of the greatest mysteries of the ancient Egyptian world to discover the remarkable secrets behind unmarked sarcophagi, unusual burials, horribly disfigured mummies and more.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: Architecture mattered a great deal to Adolf Hitler; his grandiose visions were not merely buildings, but symbols of a tyrannical vision intended to impose a sense of domination upon the the world.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: Decoding tools reveal exchanges between the Fuhrer and his allies; Hitler morphs from political leader to military strategist; the masters of the Reich unleash a world war in seven years.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: Hitlers Entourage
programme.sub-title: Hermann Goring presents himself as a hero and bon vivant, but behind the façade lies a power-mad architect of Nazi terror.
programme.desc: They served Hitler, but power struggles tore them apart; this series explores Goebbels, Goring, Speer, Hess, Bormann and Eva Braun through diaries, records, and new research.

programme.title: Cleopatras Secret Tomb
programme.sub-title: Cleopatra did not hesitate to eliminate her enemies... even if they were family members; archaeologists enter the only Ptolemaic mausoleum ever discovered to shed light on the queens family.
programme.desc: Archaeologists may finally be close to finding Cleopatras final resting place thanks to new discoveries; join us and unravel the mysteries of this legendary queen.

programme.title: Cleopatras Secret Tomb
programme.sub-title: After delving in the Battle of Actium, this final episode takes us to Alexandria, where Cleopatra and her lover ended their lives; will this investigation finally lead to the legendary queens tomb?
programme.desc: Archaeologists may finally be close to finding Cleopatras final resting place thanks to new discoveries; join us and unravel the mysteries of this legendary queen.

programme.title: Unearthed: Ancient Murder Mysteries
programme.sub-title: Homicide detective Rod Demery and scientist Professor Turi King visit the ancient Italian city of Verona to investigate the death of a 14th-century warlord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Homicide detective Rod Demery and scientist Professor Turi King use modern techniques to investigate historys most intriguing murders; they visit Italy, Scotland, Denmark and the US.

programme.title: Hitlers Power
programme.sub-title: How did Hitler succeed in transforming a republic into a Fuhrer state in such a short time, how did the enforced conformity of society take place, and how willingly did the Germans fall in line?

programme.sub-title: Japans escalation of the War in the East is devastatingly effective, but despite their success it is possible to see their inevitable defeat, and they have roused the military might of the USA.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire

programme.title: Queens That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Anne was one of the hardest-working monarchs the country had ever seen; she brought about the union of England and Scotland, making her the first Queen of Great Britain.
programme.desc: For so long believed to be side characters in histories dominated by men, some queens wielded extraordinary power; we discover how six women ruled in ways that far surpassed their male counterparts.

programme.title: Vikings: The Making of an Empire
programme.sub-title: When his father died in 958 A.D. / C.E., Danish king Harald Bluetooth inherited a fragmented kingdom threatened by Otto Is empire but succeeded in turning it into a unified Christian kingdom.
programme.desc: We travel a thousand years back in time to chronicle the epic rise and fall of historys first and only Viking empire, a riveting story of three generations that changed the course of history.

programme.title: Salme: Ancient Viking Burial Ships
programme.sub-title: We travel back to the Europe of over a thousand years ago to discover what it meant to be a Viking during the Viking age and explore one of the most exciting archaeological finds of recent times.
programme.desc: In 2008, one of two Viking-era ships was accidentally unearthed in Estonia; we uncover the mystery behind the two ships that could transform our understanding of Viking-era Europe.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.sub-title: Berlin falls and the war in Europe ends. Okinawa falls with terrible losses on both sides as each prepares for the invasion of the first of the major home islands - but a new weapon is unleashed.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: Rise and Fall: The Turning Points of World War II
programme.sub-title: The Axis forces begin to lose hold on their previous triumphs; between Japans loosening hold on southeast Asia and Germanys growing defeats in Europe, we begin to see WW2s turning of the tide.
programme.desc: Through military campaigns, great battles, retreats, defeats and victories, we examine what decided the affair on and above the battlefields of Europe, Asia and North Africa and in the worlds oceans.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: Weapons win wars; its been claimed that the human race has spent more time, money, and effort in developing weapons than in any other single field of human endeavour.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: Vikings: The Making of an Empire
programme.sub-title: King Harald Bluetooth consolidates his own authority among the Danes by choosing to be baptised and convert his people, but power in over-ambitious hands can unfortunately lead to the worst.
programme.desc: We travel a thousand years back in time to chronicle the epic rise and fall of historys first and only Viking empire, a riveting story of three generations that changed the course of history.

programme.title: Salme: Ancient Viking Burial Ships
programme.sub-title: Viking-age researcher Neil Price takes us on a tour to Sweden where the Vikings found in Saaremaa likely hailed from, and we explore the possible reasons behind spectacular ship burials.
programme.desc: In 2008, one of two Viking-era ships was accidentally unearthed in Estonia; we uncover the mystery behind the two ships that could transform our understanding of Viking-era Europe.
